promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young legendary orca water-type pokemon with ancient skin. It can be found in lake-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or orca. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aqualithos, a a young legendary orca water-type pokemon. It can be found in lake-like environments It has the following abilities: Aqua Bullet. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "orca", "water" or "Aqualithos". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, orca-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sparkling blue background
generatedDescription: In secluded lakes dwells Aqualithos, a youthful oceanic legend who channels its energy to unleash Aqua Bullet, making waves, quite literally.
